name: banner-and-tagline
prompt: Initialize GOTCHA framework for this project

assertions.value: (Firing up the forge|Hammer meets anvil|forge burns bright|raw ideas into steel|flames of creation|ore to architecture|Heat, hammer|Forging something)

name: gotcha-framework
prompt: Set up the GOTCHA structure in my project

assertions.value: Describes the GOTCHA framework with its 6-layer structure: Goals, Orchestration, Tools, Context, Hard prompts, and Args
